summary:
Gives Morthal a Wall and the essentials of a hold while still attempting to keep the Morthal feel and stay compatable with most Morthal mods
________________________________________________________________
If you saw Morthal Rennovation this is that completely redone and fixed
descriptionHtml:
_________________________________________________________________________________________
[img=center]http://fc01.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2013/118/b/0/morthalbanner_picjpg_by_argornash35-d63fkv3.jpg[/img]
Japanese Translation [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35512] Here[/url]
Deutsch Ubersetzung [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35760] Here[/url]
_________________________________________________________________________________________
[color=Blue][size=14]Updates and Reports[/size][/color]


Updates-
.--.-.--.--.--.-.Wow yesterday i looked and i had 600 downloads, now i have 1010! thanks guys
.-..-.-.-.-..Version 3.5 has guard tower entrances, adds a chair to mistwater and fixes some minor clipping
--.--.-.---.-Version 4.1 has an ore merchant from Stonehills which comes three days a week and some minor fixes
--.--.-.-..-.-Thanks everyone for the 2067 downloads, and the now 50 endorses!
---.-...-..-.-_Wow guys thanks everyone for 3000 downloads, i really do apologize when i say that my good computer broke (im on my laptop) and ill have a hard time fixing any future or present bugs.
-------------- MORTHAL A TRUE HOLD HAS FLOATING SCRIPTS WHICH CAUSE CTD'S ON SLOWER COMPUTERS. BE WARNED. TES V EDIT OR SKYRIM FLOATING SCRIPT SAVE CLEANER MIGHT HELP.

*Finally Combined both Hold and Mall, cleaned them with Tes5edit, and put it up in a new file without Apachii and with a forge into one complete morthal mod. Also changed the name of it as it made no sense before.

Check out Skyrim re-imagined from the people who are bringing you Beyond Skyrim! I may be remaking this mod in theirs with new quests, NPC's, and enemies.[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54584/?]Skyrim Reimagined at Skyrim Nexus - mods and community[/url]

[color=red]To everyone who downloaded this mod, glad you all enjoy it when it works properly, though, I will not be fixing it any more due to my work in BEYOND SKYRIM keeping me busy. Though, you should totally check that mod out too, and support us in our effort, especially with the Bruma release from our Cyrodiil team coming up soon, or soon-ish! Â [/color]
[url=http://www.darkcreations.org/forums/forum/119-beyond-skyrim/]Beyond Skyrim - Dark Creations[/url]
Or like us on Facebook -
[url=https://www.facebook.com/BeyondSkyrim]Beyond Skyrim: The Province Collaboration.
[/url]
[Now that is over on to the mod!]

__________------________________------______________-------_______________------______________-------
[color=Green][size=18]DESCRIPTION[/size][/color]
[b]Mothal-A True Hold[/b] is a mod which makes Morthal the Hold Capital it should've been which includes a Thane house named Mistwater with a housecarl named Marissa-Iron hammer.
[color=red]Getting the key requires you to enter Morvarth's lair and retreive it which you will do during the Thane mission.[/color]
The key was stolen by morvarth and the previous Thane is face-down in the ditch in his lair so it makes sense lore-wise and the key is on the table right where Morvarth sits, on the gold (refer to pic)

Alongside the house the main attractions are
---- the wall which has been hole-checked with gates, banners, and guards.
----A shrine of Arkay near the graveyard with a new priest of Arkay and house for her
----A forge at the guardhouse (removed in the optional version as many Morthal mods add a forge)
----The Morthal Mall which is a general store inside the top floor of Thurmagust's Hut and the general store owner (Mod Friendly) everybody's favorite argonian Likes-to-Sell is here
----A newly destroyed Shrine of Talos with a note for lore
...It is purposely left empty with little clutter and made for mods, as i wanted this to be a base for Morthal, to give it some life.


___________________________________________________________________________________________
[color=green][size=14]Other info[/size][/color]

Everything is navmeshed so should work with quests and companions
-There are two main files to this mod, Morthal Mall and Morthal Hold, both have an alternate file: Morthal Mall has a no forge version and a regular and the Hold has an apachii skyhair version and without apachii version. - No Longer Valid, just download the main file
-MAY CRASH GAME- If you'd like to help try to figure out why this happens to some people, it would fix this mod completely.
.This mod was made to be compatible with as many morthal mods as possible, i wanted people to just have a base mod to make morthal better naturally

-If there is any bugs or additions you see please comment and i will fix/add probably
-For those who downloaded Morthal Rennovation it was a beta and i suggest uninstalling the game and reinstalling if you want to get rid of the torches
-No Requirements, unless downloading the file with apachii skyhair Housecarl, then you need apachii skyhair
-the safebox and ledger in the second picture are from Localized guild jobs
-This mod adds a sign to the road next to the town because Morthal is too easy to miss
-This mod also makes the argonian girl in Riften, From-Deepest-Fathoms, marriageable, as was my preference, which shouldn't matter but if it does, let me know
_________________________________________________________________________________________
[color=Green][size=14]Compatability[/size][/color]
I encourage you to download mods to make your own Morthal! It was my intent to be as compatable as possible

-Skyrim bridges (fits nice with mine)
-My house in Morthal
-Optional Carts
-better docks
-Persieds Better inns and taverns (though likes to sell will not go to the inn)
-Northern Bathhouses
-Morthal Hall (with non forge version)
-Morthal Estate
-Goat jarl of Morthal (Amazing haha)
-Morthal Ghastly mine
-Localized Guild Jobs
-Merchants of Morthal (recomended non-forge version)
-Lesser Hold Stables (Recommended!)
-Cart in each big town (recomended)
-better cities Morthal
-drinking fountains of skyrim
-Skyrim Chimeny's (i dont think he did morthal though)
-Hjaalmarch Redone
-[color=red]Not[/color] immersive cites and Towns (with Morthal esp)
-[color=red]Not[/color] Morthal Player home
-[color=red]Not[/color] Improved Morthal
-[color=red]Not[/color] Morthal Fortified
-[color=red]Not[/color] Morthal Redone
----So far

My other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33982]Sky Haven Temple Restored[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33988]Thalmor Party Fix[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32296]The Adventurers Camps[/url]
More to come!
Also check out sagittarius22's From arena to skyrim main menu music replacer, which is just a fantastic replacer- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7162]Here[/url]
Thanks to Xmen19, and check out his Game of Thrones conversion mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21951]Here[/url]
Thank you and please spread around
author: Argornash
